data.title: About us
data.text:
COMPANY PROFILE - IVAMONT Inc., Ivanić Grad

Ivamont Inc. provides services in area of anti-corrosion protection, thermal insulation, gas station maintenance and Construction finishing works.

Ivamont Inc. have 70 employees, but in case of increased activities and demands this number can rise. Most of our employees works in the company for more than 15 years.

Company have all needed equipment for AC protection, thermal insulation and all other services in company portfolio. All our equipment is regilarly maintaned and modernized in line with new technologies

Our business partners considers us as one of best performers regarding quality and deadlines of our services.

Some of our business partners :

Company is certified according to "G" licence of Ministry of Construction and Physical PLaning of Republic of Croatia.

All our employees are educated for work safety, fire safety, working at heights, working on oil and gas platforms on land and sea, rescue at sea……….

During all these years of Company existence, there was never problems with payments of personal incomes of employees, as well as debts to suppliers and the state, complying with all laws and regulations.
